title: About Me
summary: Front-End Engineer II with 8 years of experience at Amazon, specializing in building scalable, accessible web applications. Progressed from macro tools development to Ruby on Rails, and ultimately to modern React/TypeScript applications. Passionate about creating exceptional user experiences, writing clean maintainable code, and mentoring team members.

frontend.title: Frontend
frontend.list: React 19, TypeScript, Redux, Redux-Saga, Cloudscape Design System, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript (ES6+)

cloud.title: Cloud & DevOps
cloud.list: AWS (S3, CloudFront, Lambda, CDK), CI/CD, GitHub Actions

tools.title: Tools
tools.list: Git, Webpack, Vite, Jest, Vitest, ESLint, Prettier

amazon.title: Amazon
amazon.description: Progressed from macro tools development to Ruby on Rails, and ultimately to Front-End Engineer II working with React and TypeScript. Built and maintained large-scale applications serving millions of users, with a focus on internationalization, accessibility, and performance.
